summary: AIR BAG LIGHT CAME ON AND WOULD NOT SHUT OFF..WENT TO DEALER ... IT WAS DEFECTIVE WIRING PLUG UNDER 2ND ROW SEAT...$1059.00 TO REPAIR.  THE AIR BAG WILL NOT WORK WITHOUT IT.  THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH MANY YEARS OF FORD EXPLORER. THEY SHOULD HAVE TO PAY FOR THE REPAIR.  IT IS A SAFETY PROBLEM !!!! LIGHT STAYS ON WHETHER THE CAR IS MOVING OR NOT
